channel.title: Do you think?
channel.description: Why I am posting this today, is because I was wandering do you think they will ever eventually just turn Runescape into something like WOW (graphic wise). because honestly with the direction they are headed i think they will.

item.title: Do you think?
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

R A R E S:

Ok stop with the sigh shit because it doesn’t make you look mature. Another thing is that i am explaining how it will continue to look like WOW or atleast take ideas you don’t have to come on the thread and start with the common sense stuff i just want to know your opinion not that you have a brain.

Theres been numerous discussions of Runescape Vs WoW. Just search for them. Which is why I sighed. You asked which direction they are going in and I gave a reason. I gave my opinion very clearly and if you don’t want it why the hell did you make a thread.

Read full topic

item.title: Do you think?
item.dc:creator: @R_A_R_E_S R A R E S
item.description:
@R_A_R_E_S wrote:

[quote=“the elve age, post:7, topic:368335”][quote author=R A R E S link=topic=464488.msg3396928#msg3396928 date=1289521997]

In my opinion, rs maxed high detail already beats wow graphics in certain respects. Plus the graphics themes and stuff blizzard uses Jagex doesn’t care about. So no, they will never look the same because they are two entirely different games run by two entirely different companies.

yes, but they are almost reaching the concept of classes. by allowing you to look like a smither or whatever. I’m just saying it may become some what of WOW
[/quote]

Sigh… Here we go again with another thread of why RS is turning into WoW.

The market of todays world is slowly depleting, especially I’d say for online computer gaming (my opinion).

Runescape will not only be generating ideas from WoW, but from any other online gaming community. Have you noticed how many people WoW has to Runescape? Well Jagex obviously is going to steal ideas to suit gamers, to resemble other games. They have to make the game of what PLAYERS want to a point (they had to remove pking, ect).[/quote]

Ok stop with the sigh shit because it doesn’t make you look mature. Another thing is that i am explaining how it will continue to look like WOW or atleast take ideas you don’t have to come on the thread and start with the comment sense stuff i just want to know your opinion not that you have a brain.

Read full topic

item.title: Do you think?
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

[quote=“R A R E S, post:6, topic:368335”][quote author=Taharok link=topic=464488.msg3396880#msg3396880 date=1289517864]
In my opinion, rs maxed high detail already beats wow graphics in certain respects. Plus the graphics themes and stuff blizzard uses Jagex doesn’t care about. So no, they will never look the same because they are two entirely different games run by two entirely different companies.
[/quote]

yes, but they are almost reaching the concept of classes. by allowing you to look like a smither or whatever. I’m just saying it may become some what of WOW[/quote]

Sigh… Here we go again with another thread of why RS is turning into WoW.

The market of todays world is slowly depleting, especially I’d say for online computer gaming (my opinion).

Runescape will not only be generating ideas from WoW, but from any other online gaming community. Have you noticed how many people WoW has to Runescape? Well Jagex obviously is going to steal ideas to suit gamers, to resemble other games. They have to make the game of what PLAYERS want to a point (they had to remove pking, ect).

Read full topic

item.title: Do you think?

item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

I don’t know to be honest, I can see some similarity within the two. I would suspect RuneScape or World of Warcraft got there idea’s from one another. I have no idea, just my opinion about it.
